member.name: ShellWindowFindWindowOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for finding window in the Shell windows collection.

member.name: ShellWindowFindWindowOptions.SWFO_NEEDDISPATCH
member.summary: The window must have an IDispatch interface.

member.name: ShellWindowFindWindowOptions.SWFO_INCLUDEPENDING
member.summary: Include windows that were registered with .

member.name: ShellWindowFindWindowOptions.SWFO_COOKIEPASSED
member.summary: Causes to interpret pvarLoc as a cookie rather than a PIDL.
